div.div: Built on Pride, Destined for Greatness
Missouri Valley Schools will create an engaging environment that fosters inquisitive learners who can effectively apply their skills in an ever-changing world.
Location: Missouri Valley Elementary School, 602 N 9th St, Missouri Valley, IA 51555, USA
Location: Logan-Mo.Valley Country Club, 2455 US-30, Logan, IA 51546, USA
Please help us obtain an accurate head count for our Free Meal Program during this closure.

MVE along with the MVEPTO is collecting Box Tops. Be sure and click on MV Elementary. Keep in mind that you have 14 days to scan your receipts. Our first deadline is October 18th. Please clip those Box Tops and get them to the elementary.

video.alt: Why we love Missouri Valley Video

span.span: Our low student to teacher ratio allows us to provide individualized instruction in a cooperative learning environment. We focus on the whole child, including their academic, social-emotional, and mental health well-being.
Our schools focus on providing students avenues to explore college and career options while obtaining the necessary knowledge, skills, and strategies to be successful in post-secondary opportunities.
Before and after school care available
Our Iowa Department of Human Services approved extended care center provides structured care before and after school, on non-school days, and during the summer.

span.a: 109 E Michigan St, Missouri Valley, IA 51555
